data.name: CreateObligCollProtectionHist1
CreateObligCollProtectionHist2
CreateObligCollProtectionHist3
CreateObligCollProtectionHist4
CreateObligCollProtectionHist5
CreateObligCollProtectionHist6
ReadCollection1
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, ADJ_IND, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, DIST_MTD from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (COLL_DT between cast(@cvrdCollStrtDt as date) and cast(@cvrdCollEndDt as date)) and (ADJ_IND = 'N') and (DIST_MTD = 'A') and (APPLIED_TO_CD = @appliedToCd)

data.name: ReadCollection2
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, ADJ_IND, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, DIST_MTD from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (COLL_DT between cast(@cvrdCollStrtDt as date) and cast(@cvrdCollEndDt as date)) and (ADJ_IND = 'N') and (DIST_MTD = 'A')

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist1
data.value: select top(1) CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT, CVRD_COLL_END_DT, DEACTIVATION_DATE, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REASON_TEXT, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTY_IDENTIFIER, OBG_IDENTIFIER, PROTECTION_LEVEL from CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@obgIdentifier = OBG_IDENTIFIER) and (@otyIdentifier = OTY_IDENTIFIER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT <= @cvrdCollStrtDt) and (CVRD_COLL_END_DT >= @cvrdCollEndDt) and (DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate) and (PROTECTION_LEVEL = ' ')

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist2
data.value: select top(1) CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT, CVRD_COLL_END_DT, DEACTIVATION_DATE, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REASON_TEXT, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTY_IDENTIFIER, OBG_IDENTIFIER, PROTECTION_LEVEL from CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@obgIdentifier = OBG_IDENTIFIER) and (@otyIdentifier = OTY_IDENTIFIER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT <= @cvrdCollStrtDt) and (CVRD_COLL_END_DT >= @cvrdCollEndDt) and (DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate) and (PROTECTION_LEVEL in (cast(@protectionLevel as char(1)), ' '))

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist3
data.value: select CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT, CVRD_COLL_END_DT, DEACTIVATION_DATE, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REASON_TEXT, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTY_IDENTIFIER, OBG_IDENTIFIER, PROTECTION_LEVEL from CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@obgIdentifier = OBG_IDENTIFIER) and (@otyIdentifier = OTY_IDENTIFIER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT <= @cvrdCollStrtDt) and (CVRD_COLL_END_DT >= @cvrdCollEndDt) and (DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate) and (PROTECTION_LEVEL = @protectionLevel) order by CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist4
data.value: select CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT, CVRD_COLL_END_DT, DEACTIVATION_DATE, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REASON_TEXT, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTY_IDENTIFIER, OBG_IDENTIFIER, PROTECTION_LEVEL from CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@obgIdentifier = OBG_IDENTIFIER) and (@otyIdentifier = OTY_IDENTIFIER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT <= @cvrdCollStrtDt) and (CVRD_COLL_END_DT >= @cvrdCollEndDt) and (DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate) and (PROTECTION_LEVEL = ' ') order by CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist5
data.value: select CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT, CVRD_COLL_END_DT, DEACTIVATION_DATE, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, REASON_TEXT, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTY_IDENTIFIER, OBG_IDENTIFIER, PROTECTION_LEVEL from CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@obgIdentifier = OBG_IDENTIFIER) and (@otyIdentifier = OTY_IDENTIFIER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT <= @cvrdCollStrtDt) and (CVRD_COLL_END_DT >= @cvrdCollEndDt) and (DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate) order by CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT

data.name: UpdateCollection
data.value: update CKT_COLLECTION set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, DIST_MTD = @distMtd where (COLL_ID = @collId) and (CRT_TYPE = @crtType) and (CST_ID = @cstId) and (CRV_ID = @crvId) and (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_ID = @otrId) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType) and (OTY_ID = @otyId)

data.name: UpdateObligCollProtectionHist
data.value: update CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST set DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CREATED_TMST = @createdTmst) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTY_IDENTIFIER = @otyIdentifier) and (OBG_IDENTIFIER = @obgIdentifier)
